briefTitle: Identifying Underserved Individuals inTexas With Hereditary Cancer Risk Using Mobile Mammography Units and Telegenetics.
officialTitle: Identifying Underserved Individuals inTexas With Hereditary Cancer Risk Using Mobile Mammography Units and Telegenetics.
conditions: Ovarian Cancer, Breast Cancer, Colorectal Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To identify underserved women at risk for hereditary breast and colorectal cancers eligible for standard-of-care genetic counseling using national screening guidelines.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Any woman scheduled at Project VALET mammography screening mobile units will be eligible for this study.

Exclusion Criteria:
